The oversample of 408 blacks included 306 interviews with blacks who had previously participated in national Gallup Polls and agreed to be re-interviewed at a later date.  The results are weighted to be representative of a national adult population.

QuestionTxt: Do you approve or disapprove of the way Barack Obama is handling his job as president?
SampleDesc: National adult including an oversample of African Americans
IntMethod: Telephone Interview, Cell Phone; Telephone Interview, Landline
StudyNote: Interviews were conducted with respondents on landline telephones and cellular phones.  The oversample of 376 non-Hispanic blacks consisted of 88 interviews done as part of the random national sample, and 288 interviews with blacks who had previously participated in national Gallup Polls, and agreed to be re-interviewed at a later date.   Results were weighted to be representative of a national adult population.
